title: Coronavirus: A Cost-Benefit Analysis of The Economic Shutdown
description: One of the prominent economic debates to emerge during the coronavirus outbreak has been whether  to continue with shelter in place measures that are hurting the economy but, hopefully, slowing the virus' spread. On this episode, Luigi does a cost-benefit analysis that shows why it could be better to keep the economy closed, and debates his proposal with Russ Roberts, host of the popular EconTalk podcast.
